example.name: beyond-p
example.text: The mountains are beyond the city .

example.name: beyond
example.text: there was a T2 lesion extending into but not beyond the muscularis propria in the rectum
example.amr: (e / extend-01 :ARG1 (s / sign-symptom :name (n / name :op1 "lesion") :ARG1-of (a / ajcc-entity-91 :ARG3 (t / tumor-stage-entity :value "T2"))) :ARG4 (i2 / inside-01 :ARG2 (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "muscularis" :op2 "propria") :location (a3 / anatomical-site :name (n3 / name :op1 "rectum"))) :ARG1-of (c / contrast-01 :ARG2 (b / beyond-01 :polarity - :ARG2 a2))))

roleset.name: outside of one's capability

role.descr: entity whose capability it is beyond

example.name: beyond-j
example.text: Facing the truth of the matter , that he treated women like dirt and that if a woman had the courage to say no to him she had better shop the resume , is beyond you .

propbank.arg: Facing the truth of the matter , that he treated women like dirt and that if a woman had the courage to say no to him she had better shop the resume ,
